rules_text:
[i]Engage! [/i]– {2}{W}{U} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Momentum[/i] – Whenever Sigurd, Emblem of The Holy Knight engages or whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, double target creatures power until end of turn. That creature gains “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards.” until end of turn.
